resources.string: Pick who you want to kill
Pick who you want to cure
Pick who you want to investigate

string-array.name: deaths_female
string-array.item: A loud scream woke you up. ; fell on her head from the second floor
Time for morning coffee, but as soon as you entered the kitchen, you saw ; with a fork in the toaster.
The phone rings, the hospital informs you that ; died in a car accident.
A pool of blood surrounds ;, who was beaten to death with a coffee machine.
The drawer is missing a knife! Later you find it stuck in the ass of a dead ;.
There\'s nothing better than toast for breakfast. Instead of in the kitchen, you find the toaster taking a bath in the bathtub with ;.
Good morning coffee drinkers! You drink coffee together on the terrace and enjoy the view, but your eyes are diverted by ;, who begins to suffocate and dramatically falls to the floor.
Before taking medicines, it is important to look at the expiration date, ; learned that today.
The more the better! That\'s what ; thought while taking a little too many antidepressants.
; accidentally used glue instead of toothpaste.
; got stuck in the washing machine and suffocated.
In order to earn money for a new car, ; sold both of her kidneys.
; was playing with the dog, she soon realized that, instead of a ball, she was holding a beehive in her hand.
; forgot to feed the cats who had nothing to eat but her.
Desperate ; went on a date with the first person she saw on tinder... She never came back.
Sometimes, the dildo can be too big. ; opened her ass and bled to death.
"Why would bears be so cute if you can\'t love them" - ;\'s last words.
; had a nasty LSD trip and thought she could fly... She threw herself off a cliff.
Sometimes it is difficult to distinguish edible from poisonous mushrooms. ; ate the wrong kind of mushrooms, but instead of dying, she became a zombie. Then a neighbor shot her in the head.
Congratulations, ; won the lottery! She decided to use all the money to travel to the Titanic in a submarine controlled by a billionaire with a joystick. In the end, the submarine imploded...
; fell asleep with a cigar in her mouth and set the house on fire.

string-array.name: deaths_male
string-array.item: A loud scream woke you up. ; fell on his head from the second floor.
Time for morning coffee, but as soon as you entered the kitchen, you saw ; with a fork in the toaster.
The phone rings, the hospital informs you that ; died in a car accident.
A pool of blood surrounds ;, who was beaten to death with a coffee machine.
The drawer is missing a knife! Later you find it stuck in dead ;\'s ass.
There\'s nothing better than toast for breakfast. Instead of in the kitchen, you find the toaster bathing in the bathtub with ;.
Good morning coffee drinkers! You drink coffee together on the terrace and enjoy the view, but your eyes are diverted by ;, who begins to choke and dramatically falls to the floor.
Before taking medicines, it is important to look at the expiration date, ; learned that today.
The more the better! That\'s what ; thought when he was taking a little too many antidepressants.
; accidentally used glue instead of toothpaste.
; got stuck in the washing machine and suffocated.
In order to earn money for a new car, ; sold both of his kidneys.
; was playing with the dog, he soon realized that, instead of a ball, he was holding a beehive in his hand.
; forgot to feed the cats who had nothing to eat but him.
Desperate ; went on a date with the first person he saw on tinder... He never came back.
Sometimes, the dildo can be too big. ; opened his ass and bled to death.
"Why would bears be so cute if you can\'t love them" - ;\'s last words.
; had a nasty LSD trip and thought he could fly... He threw himself off a cliff.
Sometimes it is difficult to distinguish edible from poisonous mushrooms. ; ate the wrong kind of mushrooms, but instead of dying, he became a zombie. Then a neighbor shot him in the head.
Congratulations, ; won the lottery! He decided to use all the money to travel to the Titanic in a submarine controlled by a billionaire with a joystick. In the end, the submarine imploded...
; fell asleep with a cigar in his mouth and set fire to the house.

string-array.name: cures_male
string-array.item: Fortunately, the doctor reacted in time.
But a stroke is not a problem for this almighty doctor!
No doctor is equal to our doctor who immediately knew what to do.
The doctor used the same coffee machine to revive him.
The doctor performed resuscitation by hitting and blowing on the buttocks.
After traversing 7 mountains and 7 seas, slaying a dragon and finding an omniscient dwarf, the doctor uses magic to revive ;.
The doctor immediately found an antidote and saved ;.
Thank God, the doctor knew how to help.
This is not the first overdose case for the doctor and he knew what to do.
The doctor removes the adhesive by putting acetone in the mouth.
Fortunately, the doctor is his half-brother.
The customer was a doctor and he restored one of his kidneys.
It was found out that ; is allergic to bee stings, luckily the doctor had an EpiPen.
The doctor made the cats vomit and taped the ; in place.
The doctor watched too many crime series and used the knowledge gained to find ;, imprisoned in the basement of a psychopath.
The doctor funneled the blood back into the anus and saved ;.
Having a black belt in karate, the doctor beat up the bear, opened its guts and saved ;.
The doctor caught him and gave him some milk to calm him down.
The doctor made Frankenstein out of a dead zombie.
The doctor inflated the submarine back with oxygen, and the submarine safely floated to the surface.
The doctor is a fireman in his spare time.

The doctor is a fireman in his spare time.
